topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f7604463687230d9660100#post_54f7604463687230d9660100
That's not really the problem, The problem is that he acts like a huge prude over anything that could be considered Fanservice.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f7604463687230d9660100#post_54f7604463687230d9660100
It doesn't bug me, but I wish I was more tolerant of it myself.

If that kind of thing is what you like, I'm not one to stop you from doing so.

I'm not 100% against it though, but I can only really tolerate very fringe subjects.

You can talk about it around me, and I'll just sit silently on the sidelines.
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f7612463687232acb30400#post_54f7612463687232acb30400
That's my personal views, but like I said, you're allowed to like what you like, and I'll believe what I believe. 

I might disagree some of the time, and that's ok. Conflict can be good, mainly because it keeps us all individual.
